# Contributing Guidelines / 貢獻指南

**TL;DR**: Report issues, submit pull requests, follow code standards. All contributions welcome.

**簡介**: 歡迎回報問題、提交 PR、遵循程式碼規範。所有貢獻都歡迎。

---

## How to Contribute / 如何貢獻

### 1. Report Issues / 回報問題

- Use issue templates / 使用問題範本
- Provide clear description / 提供清楚描述
- Include reproduction steps / 包含重現步驟

### 2. Submit Pull Requests / 提交 Pull Requests

```bash
# Fork and clone / Fork 並複製
git clone https://github.com/thc1006/NYCU-Campus-3D-Buildings.git
cd NYCU-Campus-3D-Buildings

# Create branch / 建立分支
git checkout -b feature/your-feature

# Make changes and commit / 修改並提交
git add .
git commit -m "feat: your feature description"

# Push and create PR / 推送並建立 PR
git push origin feature/your-feature
```

### 3. Code Standards / 程式碼規範

- Python: Follow PEP 8 / 遵循 PEP 8
- Comments: Bilingual preferred / 註解：雙語優先
- Documentation: Update relevant docs / 文件：更新相關文件

---

## Communication / 溝通管道

- Issues: Bug reports, feature requests / 問題回報、功能請求
- Discussions: General questions / 一般問題討論
- Email: hctsai@linux.com / 郵件聯繫

---

**Thank you for contributing! / 感謝您的貢獻！**
